member.name: F:ObservatoryLib.Platform.CreationTimeoutMs
member.summary: Maximum duration, in milliseconds, to wait for a message thread to be created during the call to Init().

member.name: M:ObservatoryLib.Platform.Init
member.summary: Initializes Observatory and establishes the calling thread as the one on which the OpenGL context will be accessed.

member.name: M:ObservatoryLib.Platform.Run
member.summary: Runs a message loop on the current thread. This is useful, for example, to prevent a console application from exiting.
